response.answer_text: In ESI they have successfully designed, manufactured and supplied SMPS based Battery Chargers for many applications SALIENT FEATURES OF ESI SMPS BATTERY CHARGER: For the life of battery Pre-programmed charging profileCharger prevents over-heating & over-charging of batterySupersedes standard VOLTAGE sensing (for end of charging process) by TIMER over ride for ill maintained or aging batteriesFriendly features for the end-user Charging indication with a blinking LEDDepth of charge status by multiple LEDs (optional)CV mode charging indicationEnd of charge notification by blinking LEDs 7 buzzerEasy replacement of mother board ensures quick on the spot servicingWall/table/panel mounting options are available as per customer’s requirementContact Information : CEO- SOMEN GHOSH call -9331036892 or 9903993911Write a mail at — somenghosh@esielectro.com

SMPS is a circuit technology that is used by virtually every electronics power supply manufacturer right now; it is a mature technology supported by electronic components from many companies that make designing and building SMPS based power supplies fairly easy and predictable.
